info.title: Weatherbit.io - Swagger UI Weather API documentation
info.description: This is the documentation for the Weatherbit Weather API.  The base URL for the API is [http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/](http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/) or [https://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/](http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/). Below is the Swagger UI documentation for the API. All API requests require the `key` parameter.        An Example for a 5 day forecast for London, UK would be `http://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/forecast/3hourly?city=London`&`country=UK`. See our [Weather API description page](https://www.weatherbit.io/api) for additional documentation.

get.summary: Returns a Current Observation - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns a Current Observation - given a lat, and a lon.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude component of location.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude component of location.

parameters.name: marine
parameters.description: Marine stations only (buoys, oil platforms, etc)

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback - Example - callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns a current observation by city id.
get.description: Returns current weather observation - Given a City ID.

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: City ID. Example: 4487042

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: marine
parameters.description: Marine stations only (buoys, oil platforms, etc)

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback - Example - callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns a current observation by postal code.
get.description: Returns current weather observation - Given a Postal Code.

parameters.name: postal_code
parameters.description: Postal Code. Example: 28546

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter).

parameters.name: marine
parameters.description: Marine stations only (buoys, oil platforms, etc)

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback - Example - callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns a group of observations given a list of cities
get.description: Returns a group of Current Observations - Given a list of City IDs.

parameters.name: cities
parameters.description: Comma separated list of City ID's. Example: 4487042, 4494942, 4504871

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: marine
parameters.description: Marine stations only (buoys, oil platforms, etc)

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback - Example - callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns a Current Observation - Given City and/or State, Country.
get.description: Returns a Current Observation - Given a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City search.. Example - &city=Raleigh,NC or &city=Berlin,DE or city=Paris&country=FR

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Full name of state.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter).

parameters.name: marine
parameters.description: Marine stations only (buoys, oil platforms, etc)

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback - Example - callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns a 3-hourly forecast - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns a 3-hourly forecast, where each point represents a three hour   period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD:HH". Time is UTC.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude component of location.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude component of location.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Default 5.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example - callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns a daily forecast - Given Lat/Lon.
get.description: Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude component of location.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to return. Default 16.

parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns a daily forecast - Given City and/or State, Country.
get.description: Returns a daily forecast, where each point represents one day (24hr) period. Every point has a datetime string in the format "YYYY-MM-DD". One day begins at 00:00 UTC, and ends at 23:59 UTC. Accepts a city in the format of City,ST or City. The state, and country parameters can be provided to make the search more accurate.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Full name of state.

parameters.description: Country Code (2 letter).

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example - callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns an Geolocation object.
get.description: Returns a geolocation object. Given an IP address. If no IP supplied, will use request IP address.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: IP address

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: exclude=all => return IP address only

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: &format=none => return IP address as string

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat/lon.
get.description: Returns Historical Observations - Given a lat, and lon. **(LIMIT 1 day for Free plan. LIMIT 7 days for Developer. LIMIT 30 days for Advanced/Advanced+/Enterprise)**

parameters.description: Latitude component of location.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude component of location.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language (Default: English) See language field description

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns Energy Forecast API response  - Given a single lat/lon.
get.description: Retrieve an 8 day forecast relevant to te Energy Sector (degree days, solar radiation, precipitation, wind).

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude component of location.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude component of location.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Temperature threshold to use to calculate degree days (default 18 C)

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns Energy API response  - Given a single lat/lon.
get.description: Returns aggregate energy specific historical weather fields, over a specified time period.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude component of location.

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude component of location.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).

parameters.name: tp
parameters.description: Time period to aggregate by (daily, monthly)

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Temperature threshold to use to calculate degree days (default 18 C)

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Returns multiple locations given a bounding box.
get.description: Returns aggregate energy specific historical weather fields, over a specified time period. Supply a bounding box ex: lat1=40&lon1=-78&lat2=38&lon2=-80. This API will return UP TO 150 stations, aggregated by the specified time period start_date to end_date.

parameters.name: lat1
parameters.description: Latitude of upper left corner.

parameters.name: lon1
parameters.description: Longitude of upper left corner.

parameters.name: lat2
parameters.description: Latitude of lower right corner.

parameters.name: lon2
parameters.description: Longitude of lower right corner.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End Date (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD:HH).

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Temperature threshold to use to calculate degree days (default 18 C)

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Convert to units. Default Metric See units field description

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Wraps return in jsonp callback. Example: callback=func

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

get.summary: Download pre-generated bulk datasets
get.description: **(Advanceed/Enterprise plans only)** Downloads bulk data files - OPTIONS: ( current.json.gz - Current observations for cities > 1000 population). Units are Metric (Celcius, m/s, etc).

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Filename (ie. current.json.gz)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your registered API key.

precip.description: Accumulated precipitation since last forecast point. Default (mm)

icon.description: Icon code for forecast image display

pod.description: Part of day (d = day, n = night)

pop.description: Chance of Precipitation as a percentage (%)
